page.title: 15Youth Provision in Gringley
page.content: {From interviews with 15 yr olds Wayne {Christmas & Keith Stanley (Laycock Av) { {WEEKENDS & EVENINGS}:congregate at bus stop in village;watch TV/Videos (War/ Horror/Comedy);swim in canal near Middle Bridge;Youth Club;Wayne likes tracking in fields on motorbike. {SUMMER HOLIDAYS}(6 weeks):Keith earns Â£20 per wk. working 8am-8pm on uncle's farm:stacks bales,feeds & "mucks out " pigs;wants farmwork on leaving school. {CHRISTMAS HOLIDAYS}(2 weeks):when it snows people come from miles around to sledge on Beacon Hill;Keith uses a strong plastic bag as a sledge. {POCKET MONEY}:Wayne has a newspaper round delivering 250 free papers,2 evenings for Â£4.70 per week. {BEST LOCAL EVENT OF YEAR}:Gringley Sports Day (July).
